list.name: Data Reconstruction Drift Alerts
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from timestamp) AS time,
  CASE
    WHEN value > upper_threshold THEN concat('Upper threshold for ', metric_name, ' crossed')
    ELSE concat('Lower threshold for ', metric_name, ' crossed')
  END
      as text,
  concat_ws(', ', 'Feature Drift', 'Multivariate Feature Drift', 'Reconstruction Error Drift') as tags
FROM
  data_reconstruction_feature_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(timestamp) AND alert is true AND model_id = ${model_id};

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  count(*) FILTER (WHERE alert) AS "alert"
FROM statistical_feature_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  feature_name IN ($feature_names)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  count(*) FILTER (WHERE alert) AS "alert"
FROM data_reconstruction_feature_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  count(*) FILTER (WHERE alert) AS "alert"
FROM statistical_output_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  output_name = 'y_pred'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  count(*) FILTER (WHERE alert) AS "alert"
FROM statistical_output_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  output_name = 'y_pred_proba'
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias("timestamp",$__interval),
  count(*) FILTER (WHERE alert) AS "alert"
FROM target_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  metric_name AS metric,
  value,
  feature_name
FROM statistical_feature_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  feature_name IN ($feature_names)
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  alert
FROM statistical_feature_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  feature_name IN ($feature_names)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  metric_name AS metric,
  value
FROM data_reconstruction_feature_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  lower_threshold,
  upper_threshold
FROM data_reconstruction_feature_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  alert
FROM data_reconstruction_feature_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  metric_name AS metric,
  value
FROM statistical_output_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  output_name = 'y_pred'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  alert
FROM statistical_output_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  output_name = 'y_pred'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  concat(metric_name, ' - ', 'Upmarket Card') AS metric,
  value
FROM statistical_output_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  output_name = 'y_pred_proba_upmarket_card'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  alert
FROM statistical_output_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  output_name = 'y_pred_proba'
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  concat(metric_name, ' - ', 'Highstreet Card') AS metric,
  value
FROM statistical_output_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  output_name = 'y_pred_proba_highstreet_card'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  concat(metric_name, ' - ', 'Prepaid Card') AS metric,

FROM statistical_output_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id AND
  output_name = 'y_pred_proba_prepaid_card'
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  metric_name AS metric,
  value
FROM target_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id
ORDER BY 1,2

SELECT
  "timestamp" AS "time",
  alert
FROM target_drift_metrics
WHERE
  $__timeFilter("timestamp") AND
  model_id = $model_id
ORDER BY 1

list.definition: select id from model where model.name = '${model_name}'
list.name: model_id
list.query: select id from model where model.name = '${model_name}'

list.definition: select distinct feature_name from statistical_feature_drift_metrics  where model_id=${model_id}
list.label: Features
list.name: feature_names
list.query: select distinct feature_name from statistical_feature_drift_metrics  where model_id=${model_id}
